title: Fun Fact: Fiora's W is the strongest Attack Speed Slow in the game
body:
Fiora's Parry slows AS by 50% 

Nasus's Wither slows AS by 17.5%-47.5%

Malphite's Ground Slam slows by 30-50%

And while Fiora's slow doesn't last as long it's important to remember that it isn't the primary function of the ability like Malphite and Nasus's slows are.

replies.body: for 1.5 seconds before tenacity. maybe they wanted her to be able to duel marksmen.
But at the same time is makes it impossible for anyone to fight her level 2. Plus she already duels marksmen very easily with her ultimate and % HP true damage (that has an AD scaling).

> [{quoted}](name=AirKingNeo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZEiqK5ke,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-02-25T16:44:09.129+0000)
>
> But at the same time is makes it impossible for anyone to fight her level 2. Plus she already duels marksmen very easily with her ultimate and % HP true damage (that has an AD scaling).

She is kited quite easily unless she has a bunch of minions to Q to. And even then you might have to flash on the adc

She is not kited easily at all. She has a slow and 60% CDR added to her Q when she hits you with it. Toss on Phage.

Kite you say?
You forgot 50% speed boost with ult too.
Not just a Phage... A Black Cleaver with even more CDR ;)
Actually Trinity Force. I mean why would I need armor shred when I can one shot squishies and have scaling % HP damage.

Because Physical Damage is still your main source of Damage (72% of the damage dealt is Physical according to multiple sites)? 

And Black Cleaver is much cheaper, gives more AD, more HP, and the Armor Shred works against Base Armor, so it is actually pretty good against Squishy Champions. It also helps with Lifesteal (we know that Fiora is one of the few champions who actually stacks Lifesteal items).

While Trinity Force brings a lot of stats, Fiora doesn't really need all of them. She doesn't need Mana, Attack Speed is ok-ish, but she prefers to do Auto-Attack resets with her abilities than to just Auto-Attack.

Also, you overestimate how much Damage the Sheen Procs' bring. In the Early-Mid game they are pretty good, but as the game goes on, they actually become worse... just because of Armor Growth per level.
Except those websites only calc damage, not damage against champions.
WOAH REALLY? thats news to me!

You can dodge Fiora's parry unless you were doing something she was parrying. And you can bait out parry.

Nasus Wither is point and click and is one of the strongest MS slows in the game.

Ground Slam will actually hurt because it scales with armor.
Fiora doesn't build AP for W.

And no, it is one of the primary functions.
It is for dueling people. If she landed the slow on you in the first place, she either parried something or you were stupid enough to stand still to get hit by a slow and forecasted skillshot.

Are you going to list what they can do?

Ground slam hurts in midgame and falls off in late game, so saying that it "hurts" is hiding 50% of the truth

Parry is a kayle ulti for 0.75 sec, combined with a morgana black shield, it can also stun 

the attack speed slow makes no sens

As a fiora main, the atk speed slow isn't really factored into anything and it is used mostly for the Dodge of damage and regular slow. The atk speed slow is nice and all, but don't get rid of it. She's not in the best state rn after black cleaver losing a good bit of damage.
fiora parry is more of a stasis with a conditional stun added to it, you cant move, so if you mess it up it can really backfire.  you can still take turret shots too
It's pretty much the only prayer she has at outdueling high AS based duelists like Yasuo, Jax, and Tryndamere.

> [{quoted}](name=DunkinNoobs,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZEiqK5ke,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-02-26T04:19:48.141+0000)
>
> It's pretty much the only prayer she has at outdueling high AS based duelists like Yasuo, Jax, and Tryndamere.

Your idea is correct but your champions are so, so, wrong.

Fiora fucks Yasuo because he can't knock up her, so he practically has no ult. She is hard to kite due to her dashes, as well. She also flat out outdamages Yasuo.

Fiora should be Riposting Jax's Counter Strike. If done correctly, there is .25 seconds for Jax to activate his E and stun Fiora with getting it Riposted.

Trynd is correct however.

> [{quoted}](name=TheMoonlitShadow,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZEiqK5ke,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2017-02-26T20:25:28.794+0000)
>
> Your idea is correct but your champions are so, so, wrong.
> 
> Fiora fucks Yasuo because he can't knock up her, so he practically has no ult. She is hard to kite due to her dashes, as well. She also flat out outdamages Yasuo.

I'm actually not sure that she outdamages Yasuo, since Fiora is relatively squishy and Yasuo's crit allows him to drain-tank pretty well. I'd compare their DPS in the practice tool but you can't set the dummy's health, so she does comically large amount of true damage per vital to it (since it has 10,000 health). Yassuo at least seems to think it's not too hard to beat Fiora as long as you hold onto your tornado. I could be wrong though. With how popular Fiora is you'd think that I'd have dueled her with him at some point, but I haven't.

> Fiora should be Riposting Jax's Counter Strike. If done correctly, there is .25 seconds for Jax to activate his E and stun Fiora with getting it Riposted.

Jax's E's stun isn't what makes it powerful against Fiora. It's its ability to make him literally immune to any damage from her for two seconds. Jax can burst the squishy Fiora down very well in that time frame.

> Trynd is correct however.

Tbh Tryndamere crushes Fiora late game regardless of the AS slow IMHO.

> [{quoted}](name=PermabannedGaren,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZEiqK5ke,comment-id=000a00000000,timestamp=2017-02-28T01:10:44.674+0000)
>
> I'm actually not sure that she outdamages Yasuo, since Fiora is relatively squishy and Yasuo's crit allows him to drain-tank pretty well. I'd compare their DPS in the practice tool but you can't set the dummy's health, so she does comically large amount of true damage per vital to it (since it has 10,000 health). Yassuo at least seems to think it's not too hard to beat Fiora as long as you hold onto your tornado. I could be wrong though. With how popular Fiora is you'd think that I'd have dueled her with him at some point, but I haven't.
> 
> Jax's E's stun isn't what makes it powerful against Fiora. It's its ability to make him literally immune to any damage from her for two seconds. Jax can burst the squishy Fiora down very well in that time frame.
> 
> Tbh Tryndamere crushes Fiora late game regardless of the AS slow IMHO.

Fiora is a pretty well known Yasuo counter, I believe. Yasuo stands a chance if he can mind-game her Riposte and if the Fiora's reactions are too slow for her to Q when Yasuo Q's (mine are). Otherwise, Fiora's damage is just much higher, in terms of burst. She's got a 410% base AD ratio, substituting one of the base AD ratios for her Q's base damage, followed up by a 200% attack speed crit. Then her Q and E respectively add 110% AD and 100% AD + 200% AD + 200% AS boosts every ~2 seconds and ~5 seconds.

Also, Yasuo is squish. Especially mid game, at 3 items, Fiora will be half healthing Yas with the inital burst combo. Late game, Fiora can invest in more tank items and still retain incredibly high damage, whereas Yasuo's damage will start to fall off as he builds less cost effective items, while Fiora is investing in tank items.
I didn't even know Fiora had an AS slow. Why does she even need that? Is the short cd dash, parry, innate sustain, and true damage not enough?

> [{quoted}](name=Elkington VI,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZEiqK5ke,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-25T14:07:38.370+0000)
>
> I didn't even know Fiora had an AS slow. Why does she even need that? Is the short cd dash, parry, innate sustain, and true damage not enough?

Because why half-ass making a duelist? Might as well go balls deep, making her unbearable 1v1 and useless in teamfights.

> [{quoted}](name=Acheron16,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZEiqK5ke,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-02-26T19:24:13.815+0000)
>
> Because why half-ass making a duelist? Might as well go balls deep, making her unbearable 1v1 and useless in teamfights.

She doesn't seem that useless in teamfights. I use Trundle a lot and her teamfight seems about as good as his if played well. Only differences being she's a lot more mobile and is better 1v1.

Yea, it's just another case of unneccesary invisible power. 
It's rarly relevant, but if it does get relevant, it screws people while not rearly costeing her any power in the kit.
it's like randomly slapping an AS slow on Irelias E...

Sooo...how long until fiora support becomes a thing based on this (and y'know, the %health true damage, the slow, and potential aoe healing on ult...)

It may not be the worst thing ever now that I think about it. Maybe build it like a tanky sup since you're kinda committing to the kit effects and not ad. Hmm...

the %health truedamage is pretty low unless you get alot ad, which you won't as support.
Same with the ult heal.
And a unreliable and short singletarget ms/as slow that potentially stuns and has a really high cd is by far not enough utillity for a support.
It was mostly tongue in cheek directed at the masses who picked up mf support for reasons that aren't to counter zyra, rather than a legitimate suggestion.

I'll be honest in that I have always felt the debuff to be tacked on. I mean alongside the Slow and possible stun it's feel unnecessary.
That being said it is also one of the things that makes her a great pick into Quinn, and tbh anyone who beats Quinn is fine with me.
I don't think Quinn is absolutely broken, but she's annoying.
woah! I never knew that! good fact.

cool info, ty!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I mean its also on a massive CD.

Is she W's you she either stuns you in which case the AS slow is irrelevant. If it doesn't stun you it's a very brief debuff.

It also is a skillshot with a casting time, not a point and click. I agree it's a little bit unnecesary but it mostly feels irrelevant.

It's to let her to actually have something resembling an option when dueling someone like Tryndamere. She still gets her face punched in, but without the AS slow the lane would be laughably one-sided and she would have no potential to fight him mid and late game by herself.

Fiora's W has a really long cooldown, nasus wither lvl 1 no cdr is 15 seconds, Fiora's W no CDR lvl 1 is 24 seconds. Nasus' is point and click, last longer, longer range, and the slow gets stronger over time. Fiora W, skillshot, easy to dodge imo, primarily a self peel tool, the attack speed and ms slow aren't applied if you're CC'd by it.
